verses.content: Aw rorêltuhai, felna thu maw in hril tak tak? Aw mihriem nauhai, indiktakin maw ro in rêl?
Anih, in lungrila chun thil suoltak in thaw hlak a; Hnuoia in kuta thil nunsetaka thaw chu in bûk hlak a.
Mi rilohai chu an nu phîng sûnga inthawk hrimin Pathiena inthawka ṭhein an um a; An pieng phingleh khêlthu hrilin an invâk hmang hlak.
An tûr chu rûl tûr ang a na, Rulrîel nasêt, a na hip hlak ang chu an nih.
Chu chun rûl dawiinvêt theihai râwl chu a ngai nawh a; Ieng anga thiem khawmin dawi hai sien khawm.
Aw Pathien, an baua chun an hahai chu suktlam la, Aw LALPA, sakeibaknei vânglaihai ha lientak takhai chu khel dawk la,
Anni chu tui hrâttaka luong angin intui hmang hai sienla, A thalhai a tinin, sât fik angin um pei raw hai se.
Kawngkawrawi, intui a, bo el hlak ang hi ni sienla: A hun nawha nuhmei nau nei, nisa hmêl hrim hrim hmu lo ang hi ni raw se.
In bêlhai chun hling thing lum a hriet hma khawmin: Ama chun thlivirin la hmang a ta, A hring le a kâng lai khawm.
Mi fel chun phubalâkna chu a hmuin lâwm a ta, Mi rilo thisena chun a ke chu sâwp a tih.
Chuongchun, mihaiin, “Mi fel ta ding chun lâwmman a lo um tak tak a; Hnuoia hin rorêltu Pathien a lo um tak tak a ni hi,” tîng an tih.
